sentences.en: A man narrowly escaped death when a fire broke out in his home on Sunday morning.
sentences.cn: 周日早晨一名男子家中起火，险些丧命。

sentences.en: Five firemen narrowly escaped death when a staircase collapsed beneath their feet.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的一段楼梯坍塌时,5名消防队员险些丧命。

sentences.en: He braked hard and narrowly avoided a parked van.
sentences.cn: 他使劲踩剎车,险些撞上一辆停着的面包车.

sentences.en: He grimaced and looked narrowly at his colleague.
sentences.cn: 他做了个鬼脸，然后仔细打量着同事。

sentences.en: He narrowly missed being run over by a car.
He was narrowly defeated in the election.
sentences.cn: 他在选举中以微弱差距败北。

sentences.en: I felt his eyes narrowly upon me.
sentences.cn: 我感到他的眼睛在紧紧地盯着我.

sentences.en: Narrowly self-interested behaviour is ultimately self-defeating.
sentences.cn: 狭隘自私的行为最终会自拆台脚。

sentences.en: One bullet struck his car, narrowly missing him.
sentences.cn: 一颗子弹击中了他的汽车，差点打中他。

sentences.en: She hurled the ashtray across the room, narrowly missing my head.
sentences.cn: 她用力把烟灰缸从房间那头扔过来，差点砸到我的脑袋。

sentences.en: She narrowly won the first race.
The car narrowly missed a cyclist.
sentences.cn: 汽车差点儿撞上一位骑自行车的人。

sentences.en: The study was criticized for being too narrowly focused.
sentences.cn: 这一研究因关注范围过于狭隘而遭到批评.

sentences.en: They narrowly escaped shipwreck in a storm in the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 他们在北海遇到风暴，船险些失事。

sentences.en: They're making judgments based on a narrowly focused vision of the world.
sentences.cn: 他们的判断是基于一种狭隘的世界观。

words.tran_cn: 狭窄的，有限的；勉强的；精密的；度量小的
仔细地；勉强地；狭窄地；严密地
